pages.text: The $(item)Sigil of the Fast Miner$() is a sigil that, when activated using shift-right-click, will consume 100LP every 10 seconds and apply the Haste potion effect. Thus, it increases your mining, digging, and cutting speeds. Crafted using the $(item)Mining Reagent$() and $(item)Reinforced Slate$() in an alchemy array.
